definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Conclusions Clinical diversity and diurnal fluctuation are the characteristics of DRD.
sentences.chinese: 结论DRD患者具有症状多样及日间波动的特点。

sentences.english: Other safety standard features include front seat-mounted, side-impact air bags and daytime running lights.
sentences.chinese: 其他安全标准功能包括前座式，侧气囊和日间行驶灯。

sentences.english: A shade by day, defense by night.
Ambulatory Care Centre of Tuen Mun Hospital was completed.
sentences.chinese: 屯门医院日间医疗中心已经落成。

sentences.english: Neither the pillar of cloud by day nor the pillar of fire by night left its place in front of the people.
sentences.chinese: 日间云柱，夜间火柱，总不离开百姓的面前。

sentences.english: Please give a daytime telephone number.
sentences.chinese: 请留一个日间的电话号码。

sentences.english: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day， nor the pillar of fire by night， from before the people.
sentences.chinese: 日间云柱，夜间火柱，总不离开百姓的面前。

sentences.english: Care Centre of Tuen Mun Hospital was completed.
sentences.chinese: 屯门医院日间医疗中心已经落成。

sentences.english: There was also an addition of 969 aided day nursery places for children.
sentences.chinese: 此外，政府又增加了969个日间幼儿园资助名额。

sentences.english: The morning nurse, a big, jovial woman, was very pleasant, though.
sentences.chinese: 日间护士，一个心宽体胖的女人，非常的友善。

sentences.english: But I think of what I have done and thought during the day.
sentences.chinese: 但我回想日间的所行所思。

sentences.english: And the cloud of the LORD was upon them by day, when they went out of the camp.
sentences.chinese: 他们拔营往前行，日间有耶和华的云彩在他们以上。

sentences.english: The number of dual trips running daily between Beijing and Shanghai are cut to 66 from the previous 88.
sentences.chinese: 北京至上海日间对开数从以前的88对减为66对。

sentences.english: SWAN DAY SPA is located in the beautiful historic district of San Dimas.
sentences.chinese: 天鹅日间水疗中心坐落在美丽的圣迪马斯历史街区。

sentences.english: Good sunscreen moisturizer during the day to prevent skin aging.
sentences.chinese: 日间做好保湿防晒，防止皮肤老化。

sentences.english: A1:4-year students must attend three semesters of P. E class.
sentences.chinese: 日间部四技学生必须修习四学期体育课程。

definition: day after day/for several days running
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
